Much wond'rous Goode dothe Baia's Founte dispense.</br>More wond'rous farre dothe flowe Thyne Eloquence.</br>My Springes may aide some palsied Lymbe to free:</br>Thy myghtier Cure — must not comparede be:</br>Britannia's Self restor'd — to Libertie.

Ye kyndrede Streams, O!  keepe your wontede Course:</br>Let Ages prove your uncorrupted Source.</br>May humble Crutche bedecke poore Bladud's Shryne:</br>Britannia's Hearte be offerede uppe at Thyne.</br>
